footer.description: This frontend is hosted decentrally on IPFS (InterPlanetary File System). It serves to visualise the blockchain data and help users interact with the Thales Speed Market contracts that belong to Thales DAO. By doing so it helps users understand the risks of using those smart contracts and what the specific interactions entail. The frontend does not facilitate anything else apart from interacting with those contracts in a visually comprehensive way. In doing so, it is no different than the functionality provided by Etherscan or RPCs (Remote Procedure Calls). The frontend itself does not belong to Thales DAO or any individual. It stores no user data and has no dedicated backend or database. All code is uploaded statically directly to the IPFS. Just as the blockchain does no geo-fencing and no KYC, neither can this frontend do so. However, by interacting with Thales DAO contracts, you commit to have read, understood and accepted Thales DAOâ€™s terms of use and you take full liability in case you have not adhered to those terms.

landing.title:
Trade Faster,
Win Bigger
and Have Fun With Speed Markets!!
landing.title-desc: <bold>Speed Markets</bold> allow users to purchase short timeframe UP or DOWN positions around the current price of ETH and BTC.

content.title-1: Accelerate your fun with Speed Markets
content.text-1:
In Speed Markets, traders predict the immediate direction of ETH or BTC price movement from the current price in an all-or-nothing fashion!

Speed Market duration can be chosen from as short as 5 minutes to as long as 24 hours!
content.title-2: Exponential payout with Chained Speed Markets!
content.text-2:
Elevate Your Risk/Reward with Chained Speed Markets.

Chained Speed Markets allow sequential predictions in a single flow for explosive leveraged payouts of up to 47x, enhancing trading dynamics and potential gains.

Chained Speed Markets enable you to craft a sequence of 2 to 6 consecutive price predictions, each with a fixed Strike Time, and with an increasing payout multiplier for each added market.

Within Chained Speed Markets, you can now choose time frames between chains as short as 2 minutes, in addition to the existing options of 5 and 10 minutes.
content.title-3: Trade using any major crypto asset!
content.text-3: Positions can be purchased using many forms of collateral, with the minimum amount of each adjusted to be equal to 5 USDC. The following forms of collateral are accepted for trading:
content.text-4: Our <bold>automated permissionless smart contracts</bold> allow you to claim your winnings to your wallet as soon as your position ends. No person can stop you from trading and no person can stop you from winning!
content.title-5: Curious about the accuracy of prices?
content.text-5:
Pyth Benchmark oracles provide presteen accurate historical price information accessible by anyone, that helps traders verify trades quickly.

Pyth price data are pulled every second and are used by 300+ projects on 50+ blockchains with top of the line security and track record!
content.text-6:
Within the underlying Thales Protocol's Speed Markets architecture, solvency is not just a possibilityâ€”it's a guarantee. All your trades are 100% collateralized at all times from the moment you open them.

This essential assurance fosters a seamless and secure trading journey for all participants, instilling confidence and reliability in each transaction.
content.text-7:
No sign-up is required, meaning anyone with a Web3 wallet can participate. Additionally, you can enjoy Speed Markets with a seamless Social Login onboarding (Google, Twitter, Discord, Github, Apple, etc.), a user-friendly Deposit/Withdrawal mechanism, and a cutting edge Credit Card on-ramp aggregator enabled.

With a full implementation of Account Abstraction, all your transactions are confirmed with a single click without worrying about gas or external wallet interactions! Pay gas with buy-in collateral or even have gas paid by the platform via various gas sponsorship campaigns!

speed-markets.title: Speed Markets
speed-markets.info: Choose an <bold>asset</bold>, <bold>direction</bold> and then the <bold>duration</bold> for when to settle your trade. If the price ends in your direction when your time elapses, you win the quoted Potential Profit!

steps.choose-direction-sub: (You can add up to 6 chained positions for bigger profit)

tooltips.slippage: Your trade will revert if the live price changes more than this percentage from your chosen Strike Price during trade execution.
